item.title: Notes on Distributed Systems for Young Bloods - 分布式系统萌新忠告
item.description: 分布式系统萌新忠告 Notes on Distributed Systems for Young Bloods January 14, 2013 08:15:00 AM PST I’ve been thinking about the lessons distributed systems engineers learn on the job. A great deal of our instruction is through scars made by mistakes made in production traffic. These scars are useful reminders, sure, but it’d be better to have more
